Key Match Events: Youri Tielemans scored from the edge of the area in the second minute.
Kevin De Bruyne scored the second goal in the 80th minute after converting a long kick from goalkeeper Koen Casteels.
Romelu Lukaku had a third goal ruled out by VAR.
Dennis Man was denied a goal by Koen Casteels.
Post-Match Reflections: Belgium's win was crucial after their loss to Slovakia, which raised the prospect of another early exit from a major tournament.
The format of the Euros, in which the four best third-place teams advance, leaves more room for error, but another defeat would have broken the team's confidence.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Belgium had 67% possession in the first half.
The Belgium royal family was present at the match.
All four teams in Group E have three points, making the final round of games crucial.
